publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4300 Ross Finnie: The Draft Private Water Supplies (Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Private Water Supplies (Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*

S2M-4300 Ross Finnie: The Draft Private Water Supplies (Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2006—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Private Water Supplies (Notices) (Scotland) Regulations 2006 be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin
